subject: Thank you for your refinance loan request, we are ready to lend you some cash
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$284,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this elementary form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://storeapsagain.com/
